message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $88 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Could you do $92?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still not able to meet at $92. I would like to offer $90 for the product.
